pages.text: Tokummia is a hymenocarid arthropod from the Burgess Shale which had a shell covering its body and the front of the animal had mandibles with pincers which it used to grab soft bodied prey. It was a bottom feeder and was able to walk on the seafloor.
$(l)Eats:$() Fish Food$(br)$(l)Breeds with:$() Fish Food$(br)$(l)Egg Type:$() Drops Egg$(br)$(l)Method of Obtaining:$() Bucket
